what: WAHerb data migration from Texpress to Specify7
title: WAHerb data migration from Texpress to Specify7
text: goal waRb migrate WAHerb data legacy Texpress database Specify7.

title: WAHerb data migration from Texpress to Specify7
text: can install development version waRb GitHub :

title: WAHerb data migration from Texpress to Specify7
text: Accessing writing back files CKAN requires DBCA intranet following variables defined ~/.Renviron. CKAN API key accessible logged users profile page. Open ~/.Renviron: main data migration targets workflow.
code: CKAN_URL="https://data.dbca.wa.gov.au" CKAN_API_KEY="..." usethis::edit_r_environ() library(waRb) ## tar_make(...)  # Download data from CKAN to local fst snapshots fetch_data()   # Load local fst snapshots into memory resume_data()  # Inspect data, generate QA reports as Rmd # Transform data into target format # Upload data into Specify7 API

title: WAHerb data migration from Texpress to Specify7
text: Every contribution, constructive feedback, suggestion welcome! Send us ideas requests issues submit pull request. Pull requests eventually pass tests checks (introducing new ERRORs, WARNINGs NOTEs apart “New CRAN package” NOTE):
code: styler::style_pkg() spelling::spell_check_package() spelling::update_wordlist()  # Code and docs tested, working, committed usethis::use_version(which="patch") usethis::use_version(which="minor") usethis::use_version(which="major") usethis::edit_file("NEWS.md")  # Document to load new package version. Git commit, tag, and push. devtools::document() v <- packageVersion("waRb") system(glue::glue("git tag -a v{v} -m 'v{v}' && git push && git push --tags"))

what: Fetch data from the Data Catalogue and return as one object — fetch_data
title: Fetch data from the Data Catalogue and return as one object — fetch_data
text: Downloads data files CKAN saves individual tables fst inst/data. One data file can generate multiple tables.

title: Fetch data from the Data Catalogue and return as one object — fetch_data
Fetch data from the Data Catalogue and return as one object — fetch_data
text: ckan_url URL CKAN data catalogue fetch data . Inferred env var CKAN_URL, default: "https://data.dbca.wa.gov.au".
